text: Sean Stuart Cairncross (born July 12, 1974) is an American politician, lawyer and businessman. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==Early life== Cairncross was born in Ramsey, Minnesota. His family was raised as members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. He studied at University of Cambridge and at New York University School of Law. ==Career== Cairncross was the chief executive officer of the Millennium Challenge Corporation from 2019 to 2020. He was a senior adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump during his first presidency. He was the chief operating officer for the Republican National Committee. ==National Cyber Director== Cairncross was nominated by President Donald Trump to be the National Cyber Director on February 11, 2025. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography at Millennium Challenge Corporation *Washington Post *CNN Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state)
title: Sean Cairncross
